verses.name: Ezekiel 20:13
verses.text: But the house of Israel rebelled against me in the wilderness: they walked not in my statutes, and they despised my judgments, which if a man do, he shall even live in them; and my sabbaths they greatly polluted: then I said, I would pour out my fury upon them in the wilderness, to consume them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 20:14
verses.text: But I wrought for my name’s sake, that it should not be polluted before the heathen, in whose sight I brought them out.
